summary: A collection of high quality Skyrim wallpapers and screenshots.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Century Gothic][size=6][u][center][color=#0070c0]S[/color][color=#0070c0]oluti0ni[/color][color=#00b0f0]9[/color][color=#0070c0]e's HQ Skyrim Wallpaper Pack '3'[/color][/center][/u][/size][/font][font=Century Gothic][size=6][color=#0070c0]
[/color][/size][/font]
[center][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]This is a collection of my high quality Skyrim screenshots/wallpapers. The images are all captured and uploaded by me. They have NOT been post-processed, Photoshopped or enhanced in any way (apart from using ENB). They are available in 1920x1080 resolution for widescreen monitors only.

All my images contain vignettes. For those of you that do not know, vignettes are the two little black bars on the top and bottom of the images. I like them and believe they enhance the image to give it a cinematic feel. I cannot and will not remove them. Besides, if you use the image as a wallpaper, you can place your desktop icons in the black space![/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]These images are by no means vanilla. I've used the True Vision and Mistveil 'Autumn' ENBs. I use roughly 120 mods that enhance textures.[/size][/font][/color]

[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]Creating mods is beyond my abilities - in fact, this is an ode to all the wonderful modders and tweakers out there! These images (and many more) are a thank you to the entire modding community![/size]

[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2][b]Don't forget to Endorse and comment![/b]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2][b][i]Thank you for downloading!!![/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- Soluti0ni9e[/size]

[size=2][img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j363/solutioni9e/Pictures/Skyrim%20Caption%20Pictures/13726886434_c9d1a7c9fe_z_zps7c1e67cc.jpg[/img]﻿[/size]

[size=2][img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j363/solutioni9e/Pictures/Skyrim%20Caption%20Pictures/13751364254_6d89f94c60_z_zpsee0c7b53.jpg[/img]﻿[/size]

[size=2][img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j363/solutioni9e/Pictures/Skyrim%20Caption%20Pictures/13703076303_4d4e972181_z_zpsd2f52124.jpg[/img]﻿[/size]

[size=3]For more images, check out my [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/solutioni9e/]Flickr[/url] , [url=http://soluti0ni9e.tumblr.com/]Tumblr[/url] or [url=http://soluti0ni9e.deviantart.com/]Deviant Art[/url] site![/size]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=4]FAQ[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- Can I use these images elsewhere?[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]NO. You can use them for your personal wallpaper only. I don't want to see these being uploaded to other sites![/size][/font][/color]

[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- Can I use these images for my mods page?[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]Yes, but please send me a message stating you would like do so :)[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- What mods/tweaks do you use?[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]See my recommended mods list a bit further down this page.[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- What image capturing software do you use?[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]I use a nifty little program called [url=http://www.fraps.com/]FRAPS[/url]. This program is to be started before you run your game and allows you to take high quality screenshots while in game. No more using Steam's crappy in-game F12 snapshot![/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]- What hardware do you run?[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]Intel i5-2500k CPU @ 3.70 GHz Turbo Boost[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]ASRock P67 Extreme4 Gen3 Mobo[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]8GB G.Skill Ripjaws[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]Toshiba 128 GB Solid State Drive[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]PNY XLR8 GeForce GTX 660 Ti Fermi 2GB GDDR5 GFX Card[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2]23.5" ASUS LCD Monitor[/size][/font][/color]

[/font][/color][/font][/color][img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j363/solutioni9e/Pictures/Skyrim%20Caption%20Pictures/13767956275_6834bd3e2b_z_zps77e72122.jpg[/img]﻿
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color][color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2].[/size][/font][/color]

[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=4]Looking for an ENB? Here's the ones I have used/using:[/size][/font][/color]

[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42957/?]Mistveil ENB[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15983//?]True Vision ENB[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30158//?]K ENB[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[font=Century Gothic][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828//?]Bleak/Unbleak ENB

[img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j363/solutioni9e/Pictures/Skyrim%20Caption%20Pictures/13930720233_281888ac8e_z_zpsa567cf4a.jpg[/img]﻿
.
.
.[color=#0070c0][font=Century Gothic][size=4]Recommended Mods[/size][/font][/color]
